channel.title: Accessing c:\ on a library computer
channel.description: Ok. Sign onto the library computer. Now if it's like the one I use, it will let you get into my computer. And mine has like a "D" drive. Now, this is not C, they hid it. If you try to replace the D with C in the address bar, it's disallowed. But what you CAN do is create a SHORTCUT INSIDE D! Make the shortcut link to C:\. then, CLICK IT! You're inside the library computer.

item.title: Accessing c:\ on a library computer

At the place i go to the computers just have like a public library search engine…If you’re talking about those computer you can use for like 1hour you can do it like you mentioned.
